# Autodetect Generated Files

VS Code extension that automatically identifies and marks generated files in the explorer.

## Features

- **Regex Detection:** Scans the first 2KB of files for configurable patterns (e.g., `@autogenerated`).
- **Git Attributes:** Respects `.gitattributes` flags (e.g., `generated`, `gitlab-generated`).
- **Real-time Updates:** Automatically refreshes decorations on file save, configuration change, or `.gitattributes` modification.

## Configuration

| Setting | Default | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `autodetectGenerated.regexPatterns` | `["@autogenerated", "Generated by"]` | Regex patterns to match in file headers. |
| `autodetectGenerated.gitAttributes` | `["generated", "gitlab-generated", "linguist-generated"]` | `.gitattributes` keys to check. |
| `autodetectGenerated.badge` | `"G"` | 1-2 character badge shown in the explorer. |
| `autodetectGenerated.color` | `"charts.yellow"` | Theme color for the badge. |

## Usage

Files identified as generated will display a badge and color in the file explorer.
